title: Why Me?
description: When Lisa wakes up in a dark, damp room, the first thing her eyes process is the toilet and sink residing in the same room as her. In her confused state, what will happen when her captor makes his first appearance? What happens when she recognises him... yet realises he is a complete stranger? Is her captor a threat to her life and if he is... will she be saved in time?This is a short novel and first novel in The Revenge Series. This is not a standalone and is meant for mature readers only. (18+)
author: I.N. Jewels
